qualifier: The field `org.apache.http.impl.conn.SingleClientConnManager.managedConn` is annotated with `@GuardedBy("org.apache.http.impl.conn.SingleClientConnManager.this")`, but the lock `org.apache.http.impl.conn.SingleClientConnManager.this` is not held during the access to the field at line 351. Since the current method is non-private, it can be called from outside the current class without synchronization. Consider wrapping the access in a `synchronized(org.apache.http.impl.conn.SingleClientConnManager.this)` block or making the method private.
